item.title: Rounded Numbers

item.description:
@IfearI wrote:

Maybe Sounds Dumb but it will help me solve something xd

int tester;
tester = 1 / 2;
c.sM("1 / 2 = "+tester+".");

The Answer (Tester) should be 0.5 but it gives me 0 â€¦

so How would I make it so it would give me a rounded number with like 2 decimals or more so i could have answers like 0.13 or something?
